_header: Welcome full high and noble prince to us right special
Subjects: Edward, prince of Wales; pageant verses; occasional verse; Coventry
_description: Ceremonial verses for the Pageant at Coventry to welcome Prince Edward (1474) spoken by worthies — five stanzas rhyme royal

CovLeet.First Lines:
Welcom full high and nobull prince to vs right speciallTo this your
                    chaumbre so called of Antiquite…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…Bi thy grace from this Dragon devoureSo Lorde preserve this
                    noble prynce and euer be his socoure
